description:
Astro loses interest in his voice-over work. Black Jack, Sapphire and Yatterman 2 are in a drawing quiz show. None of them can draw.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Astro`s Dubbing / Quiz Renaissance / Quiz Renaissance / Quiz Renaissance
